exam_pattern.title: XAT 2025 Exam Pattern
exam_pattern.intro: The pattern for XAT 2025 mirrors XAT 2024 in both structure and difficulty. Candidates faced 175 minutes for the main test plus an additional 10 minutes for the General Knowledge section.

analysis.title: XAT 2024 Analysis
analysis.intro: XAT 2024 was similar in difficulty to XAT 2023, with moderate paper difficulty overall. Sectional variation, however, continues to play a major role in percentile outcomes.

toppers.title: XAT 2025 Toppers List Analysis
intro: Based on the response sheets collected for XAT 2024, we analysed score trends to understand difficulty levels across slots. In total, we reviewed 53,863 responses. The statistics below summarise the mean, median, and maximum scores across all slots—useful indicators of slot difficulty.

We've also plotted score-versus-percentile curves for all slots. In those graphs, a slot that lies below another indicates a comparatively easier paper: a lower raw score in that slot yields a higher percentile relative to tougher slots.
